text:
Message 1015 of 4024
On my way
Sent:02/03/2024 at 12:57 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/03/2024 at 05:00 PM)
Subject:Re: AD (TV fork)
Message 1016 of 4024
Can you do tomorrow for movers? They can’t do tonight.
Adrian not in good shape so will likely stay home. His arm is still hurting too.
Sent:02/03/2024 at 05:02 PM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 02/03/2024 at 05:02 PM)
Subject:Re: Lugg Tip
Message 1017 of 4024
May I please get an update? We are definitely into late afternoon and rounding the corner to evening pretty soon. Just trying to coordinate myself.
I also appreciate the conversation earlier. You are asking all the questions. But some of the details are getting mixed up. I am happy to help explain.
I understand this may be too emotional for you to even entertain however and will respect that as well. I’m just trying to show you what happened,
when.
And to be sure that you know, because I keep saying it but it doesn’t seem to register- I had access, it invaded your privacy, and should’ve informed
you
“Christine, I apologize for not informing you about my access to the Blink garage camera last week. I understand that this has caused an invasion of
your personal privacy, and for that, I am truly sorry”
I don’t know how to say sorry other than say “I am truly sorry.” I made that clear weeks ago. You wanted it to go through lawyers, so I did that too. I’
m trying.
Either way, I promised to work with you constructively after my tone issue, and I assure you that is a promise I will keep.
Sent:02/03/2024 at 05:02 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/03/2024 at 05:02 PM)
Subject:Re: Lugg Tip
Message 1018 of 4024
We missed each other in flight. Thanks for the update.
Really bummed for Adrian. Sick and hurt really sucks!
Sent:02/03/2024 at 05:04 PM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 02/03/2024 at 05:06 PM)
Subject:Re: Lugg Tip
